help.overview: Hosts a trivia game. You must opt-in to play. Don't guess randomly; you are penalized for guesses. Various statistics and rankings are calculated and stored. See the full documentation for more -- ask a bot admin for it.
help.command: Tells the bot you're playing in this round of trivia.
Tells the bot you want to stop playing in this round of trivia.
Prints out the top trivia players.
help.usage: triviatop [number of players to list, max of 10]
help.command: Prints out stats on a given trivia player.
